Magic Marker Concept Art

Concept development, brainstorming, focus group illustration

Magic marker drawings are useful to knock out ideas for advertising campaigns, to storyboard for video production, to illustrate user journeys, or to help facilitate discussion for focus groups and developer conferences.

I have created graphic illustrations and fine art with magic markers. The stark, graphic immediacy of magic markers has a gripping quality that can be quite appealing.

These magic marker drawings were created to flesh out ideas. for an advertising campaign.

Aveda – Secret Garden

In this ad campaign, quirky aficionados give themselves permission to enjoy the organic essence of Aveda.

Ann Thrax

Ann Thrax thanks his Aveda hair stylist for his scary looks.

Excommunication

The Priest said “excommunication”, Lale単a heard “exfoliation”.

Discovered

Lale単a feared her Goth friends would discover her Aveda skin cream.

Plant Poetry

I saw the best minds of my generation destroyed by madness, staring hysterical naked

Unnatural

How unnatural is her hair color? Only her Aveda hair stylist knows for sure.

Aveda products are lovingly refined from the finest essence of organic botany. Give yourself permission to enjoy this secret garden.
